seasons.text: It's New Year's Day, a new year begins, it's {year}~
Another Valentine's Day, found your match in {year}?~
Today is Arbor Day, protect the environment!
Let me tell you a secret~ Today is April Fools' Day, don't get fooled~
Today is Labor Day, planned your vacation yet?~
It's Children's Day, happy times are always short, wish we never had to grow up…
Teacher's Day, say hello to your teachers~
It's Singles' Day season, who are you spending it with?~
It's Christmas season, master must be shopping again~

time.text: Good morning! The early bird gets the worm, a beautiful day begins~
Good morning! Work going well? Don't sit too long, get up and move around!
It's noon, you've worked all morning, time for lunch!
Afternoon drowsiness hits hard, completed your exercise goal today?
It's evening! The sunset outside looks beautiful, nothing beats a sunset~
Good evening, how was your day?

text: It's getting late, get some rest, good night~
Late at night, take care of your eyes!

time.text: You're a night owl! Still up so late, can you wake up tomorrow?

default: Long time no see, time flies so fast…
Bad guy! You haven't paid attention to me in ages, QAQ~
message.console: Haha, you opened the console, want to see my secrets?
message.copy: What are you copying? Remember to credit the source when reposting!
message.changeSuccess: Do you like my new outfit?
message.changeFail: I don't have any other clothes yet!
message.goodbye: May you reunite with someone important one day.
message.hitokoto: This quote is from 「$1」, submitted by $2 on hitokoto.cn.
hoverBody: Hey, what are you doing? Move your hand~~
Mo...mouse is in the wrong place!
If you continue, I'll have to use force!
tapBody: Have you seen my teddy bear?
Touch me again and I'll call the police! ⌇●﹏●⌇
Stop touching me, I'll tell your wife to hit you!
Why are you touching me! I'll bite you!
Don't touch me, there's nothing to touch!
